Documentation for the mayaflipbook UI module¶

In this module we check to see if the user has the PyQt4 module loaded and available. If it is available, we create a PyQt derived UI which is far nicer to use both aesthetically, but also in terms of maintainability. If the user does not have the PyQt module loaded, the script falls back on a default native Maya/MEL user interface. The user interface allows the user to operate each of the commands necessary to run the Flipbook tool and to control its engine.
